what: Develop, Test and Apply Time Series Models for Mental Health Economic Analyses
title: Develop, Test and Apply Time Series Models for Mental Health Economic Analyses
text: Tools undertaking time series analysis mental health services datasets developed ready4 framework (https://ready4-dev.github.io/ready4/). development version serious package made available part process testing documenting package. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton1@monash.edu). install development version software, run following commands R console:
code: utils::install.packages("devtools")  devtools::install_github("ready4-dev/serious")
